Phương trình (3.1) biểu diễn quá trình nhúng cục bộ các thuật ngữ, trong đó Ed∼PD(Dc) X t∈dX thể hiện sự tương tác giữa các thành phần. Hình 3.5 minh họa ví dụ về việc nhúng cục bộ này. Cụ thể, C(t) đại diện cho tập hợp các thuật ngữ nằm trong cửa sổ ngữ cảnh của thuật ngữ t trong mạng lưới NETWORK; đồng thời, PD(Dc) được tham số hóa thông qua trọng số tài liệu c tại nút phân loại hiện tại. Do đó, hàm mất mát trong mô hình này đã được điều chỉnh so với hàm mất mát trong thuật toán Taxogen và thuật toán nhúng cục bộ ban đầu, nhằm cải thiện hiệu quả học và khả năng biểu diễn ngữ nghĩa của thuật ngữ trong bối cảnh cụ thể. Các đóng góp của nghiên cứu hiện tại tập trung vào việc tối ưu hóa hàm mất mát này, từ đó nâng cao chất lượng nhúng và khả năng phân loại trong mạng lưới thuật ngữ.

Partial multi-label learning (PML), which addresses the challenge of learning multi-label prediction models from instances with overly comprehensive noisy annotations, has recently attracted attention from the scholarly community. In this study, we introduce a novel adversarial learning model, PML-GAN, within a generalized encoder-decoder framework for partial multi-label learning. The PML-GAN model employs a disambiguation network to detect noisy labels and utilizes a multi-label prediction network to associate the training instances with the clarified label vectors, while implementing a generative adversarial network as a reverse mapping from label vectors to data samples in the input feature space. The learning process of the comprehensive model is represented as a minimax adversarial game, which improves the alignment of input features with output labels through a bi-directional mapping. Extensive experiments are conducted on multiple datasets, wherein the proposed model demonstrates state-of-the-art performance for partial multi-label learning.

Motor behaviour analysis plays a critical role in biomedical research and clinical diagnostics by offering a non-invasive means to detect motor impairments and evaluate changes resulting from various interventions. Traditional state-of-the-art movement analysis methods are often time-consuming and expensive due to the need for placing physical or virtual markers, and they rely heavily on prior knowledge of relevant behaviours to guide the marking of keypoints or annotations for detector training. The development of unsupervised behaviour analysis and magnification (uBAM) addresses these challenges through an automatic deep learning algorithm that identifies and amplifies behavioural deviations without requiring supervision. Central to this approach is the unsupervised learning of posture and behaviour representations, which enables objective movement comparisons and facilitates the discovery and quantification of behavioural deviations. A novel generative model is also introduced, which visually magnifies subtle differences in behaviour directly in video sequences, circumventing the need for keypoint-based annotation. Crucially, this model disentangles appearance from behaviour, allowing for the magnification of deviations even across different individuals. Experimental validation on rodent models and human patients with neurological conditions demonstrates the broad applicability of uBAM, and integration with optogenetic stimulation further highlights its potential as a non-invasive tool for linking brain function to plasticity.

Nhờ vào OpenCV, người dùng có thể thực hiện đa dạng các tác vụ như nhận dạng đối tượng, phát hiện khuôn mặt, xử lý ảnh, phân tích video và nhiều ứng dụng khác liên quan đến thị giác máy tính. Điều này đã biến thư viện trở thành một công cụ thiết yếu và phổ biến trong lĩnh vực xử lý ảnh và thị giác máy tính, đồng thời góp phần nâng cao hiệu suất và hiệu quả trong nhiều ứng dụng thực tế cũng như các dự án máy học.

Wasserstein distributionally robust optimization (WDRO) seeks to minimize the local worst-case risk in the neighborhood of the empirical data distribution as defined by a Wasserstein ball, providing robust inference but lacking comprehensive theoretical analysis. Motivated by the need for risk consistency in WDRO, we introduce a new minimizer derived from a novel approximation theorem, and rigorously establish its risk consistency. Our approach further extends WDRO to scenarios involving locally perturbed data, notably encompassing the Mixup (Zhang et al., 2017) technique as a specific example. Theoretical results confirm that our approximation and risk consistency analysis naturally generalize to these perturbed data settings. Numerical experiments on image classification datasets validate the practical robustness of our method, demonstrating that it substantially outperforms baseline models in terms of accuracy on noisy datasets. These findings not only advance the theoretical foundation of WDRO but also suggest promising directions for future research in robust machine learning under distributional uncertainty.

Abstract: This paper addresses the enhancement of road user tracking in urban environments by introducing a constraint programming (CP) approach for the data association phase within the tracking-by-detection framework of the multiple object tracking (MOT) problem. The CP approach demonstrates superior efficiency over traditional graph-based methods, particularly in managing the combinatorial complexity when analyzing multiple frames. The method leverages simple image features, specifically the center position and color of detections, to define constraints related to the MOT problem, such as color appearance preservation and motion extent between frames. To optimize performance, filtering layers eliminate unsuitable detection candidates and dummy trajectories before applying CP. The proposed methodology was evaluated on a motorized vehicle tracking dataset, yielding results that surpass the leading methods on the UA-DETRAC benchmark, highlighting its effectiveness and contribution to the field of MOT.

Ưu điểm của phương pháp này là giúp mã nguồn trở nên rõ ràng và dễ hiểu hơn. Một lớp có thể được sử dụng bởi một lớp cấp cao hơn mà không làm thay đổi bản chất của lớp đó. Vì mỗi lớp đảm nhận một vai trò riêng biệt, các lớp sẽ không bị phụ thuộc lẫn nhau, từ đó nâng cao tính mô-đun và khả năng bảo trì của hệ thống.

Google Calendar có giao diện trực quan, thân thiện với người dùng và cung cấp đầy đủ các tính năng như thêm, chỉnh sửa, xóa sự kiện, mời khách, tích hợp họp trực tuyến qua Google Meeting và thông báo qua Gmail. Ứng dụng này còn cho phép tùy chỉnh nhiều dạng xem và màu sắc cho các sự kiện. Tuy nhiên, khi sử dụng nhiều tài khoản Google, người dùng phải đăng nhập ở các cửa sổ khác nhau, gây khó khăn trong việc so sánh hoặc nhận diện các sự kiện trùng lặp. Bên cạnh đó, Google Calendar không hỗ trợ sử dụng với các loại tài khoản khác như Microsoft.

Trong trường hợp thông tin không chính xác hoặc không hợp lệ, hệ thống sẽ thông báo lỗi. Ngược lại, nếu thông tin được xác thực là hợp lệ, hệ thống sẽ tiến hành cập nhật thông tin người dùng. Sau khi quá trình cập nhật hoàn tất, hệ thống sẽ hiển thị thông báo xác nhận rằng thông tin đã được cập nhật thành công.

The paragraph describes the player's objectives and challenges within a game environment. Players must strategically defeat monsters with diverse abilities, navigate through various types of traps, and ultimately find the exit gate to escape the area. Both strategic movement and precise timing are crucial for success. Figures 5.21 and 5.22 illustrate the attack on enemies and the avoidance of traps, respectively. 

Within the game's battle context, the player's primary mission involves overcoming a series of monsters, each characterized by unique actions and abilities that present distinct challenges. To achieve success, the player must engage in strategic maneuvering and judicious use of attacks, as depicted in Figure 5.21. Beyond the threat posed by monsters, the game environment is further complicated by an array of traps designed to enhance the difficulty. These traps, which include static, activated, and moving varieties, are tailored to the specific terrains they inhabit. Players must effectively employ their jumping or double-jumping skills to evade or escape these traps, where precise timing and accuracy are paramount for navigating the terrain and advancing within the game. Figure 5.22 illustrates the mechanics of trap avoidance. Ultimately, the player's overarching goal is to locate the exit gate, thereby facilitating their escape from the current area.

This paper addresses the efficiency and scalability challenges in deep structured output learning for semantic image segmentation by introducing a novel learning scheme where deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) directly estimate messages in message passing inference for Conditional Random Fields (CRFs), eliminating the need for learning or evaluating potential functions during message calculation. This approach significantly accelerates the learning process by avoiding the expensive inference required for CRFs with CNN potentials at each stochastic gradient iteration. The proposed method reduces network output dimensionality to match the number of classes—unlike general CNN potential functions for CRFs, whose output grows exponentially with potential order—resulting in fewer parameters and improved scalability for large class sets. Applied to the PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset, the method achieves a state-of-the-art intersection-over-union score of 73.4 on the test set using only VOC training images, underscoring the effectiveness and practical value of CNN message learning for structured prediction tasks. This paper addresses the challenges of automatic coloring in 3D game scene design, a task that remains underexplored compared to automated background generation. The problem lies in the complexity of coloring a digital representation of colorful, multipart objects, which requires an understanding of the object's composition and coloring scheme. Existing single-stage methods face limitations like the need for object segmentation or the assembly of individual parts. To overcome these, we propose a two-stage training approach for synthesizing auto-colored 3D models. The first stage involves obtaining a 3D point cloud of the object, while the second stage assigns colors to these points. Utilizing the triangulation trick, we then generate a 3D mesh with surfaces colored through interpolation of the colored points, resulting in a smooth coloring scheme. Experimental results demonstrate that our two-stage approach surpasses traditional single-stage methods in both shape reconstruction and coloring quality, marking a significant advancement in automated 3D model coloring.

Chương 6 của luận văn này tập trung vào việc trình bày những kết luận rút ra từ quá trình nghiên cứu cũng như đề xuất những định hướng phát triển trong tương lai cho đồ án. Mục 2.1 của chương này cung cấp một cái nhìn tổng quan về các chức năng chính của hệ thống. Trong đó, Mục 2.1.1 minh họa biểu đồ use case tổng quát, được thể hiện trong Hình 2.1, nhằm làm rõ cấu trúc và cách thức hoạt động của hệ thống. Hệ thống được xây dựng xoay quanh hai tác nhân chính, đóng vai trò quan trọng trong việc vận hành và tương tác với các thành phần khác của hệ thống.

Building on this experiment, I propose a class-wise regularization technique designed to increase the number of eigenvectors with large eigenvalues within the eigenspace of class-wise data representations. This approach is influenced by recent studies on dimensional collapse and feature decorrelation, which aim to make the various dimensions of the embedding uncorrelated. This strategy intuitively prevents collapse in certain dimensions while simultaneously avoiding small eigenvalues.

The bidirectional encoding characteristic of BERT presents challenges for its adaptation to generative tasks, including abstractive text summarization. Consequently, alternative transformer-based models are typically favored for handling these generative formats.

The paragraph discusses the significant advancements in coding theory over the past fifty years, emphasizing the practical applications of several well-known codes in communication technologies. It cites specific examples such as the Reed-Solomon code in 3G and 4G networks, and the use of Turbo codes and LDPC codes in 5G, data modems, telephone transmission, and the NASA Deep Space Network, highlighting their pivotal roles in ensuring reliable data transmission.

Over the past five decades, coding theory has undergone remarkable development, resulting in the creation and extensive analysis of numerous codes with substantial real-world impact. Notably, the Reed-Solomon code has been widely implemented in 3G and 4G mobile communication systems, providing robust error correction capabilities essential for reliable data transfer. Furthermore, channel coding techniques such as Turbo codes and LDPC codes have become integral to the operation of 5G networks, as well as being utilized in data modems, telephone transmission systems, and the NASA Deep Space Network. These codes are critical for maintaining data integrity and enhancing the performance of communication channels by effectively mitigating the effects of noise and other impairments, as discussed in related works. The continuing evolution of coding methods, as demonstrated by these applications, underscores their foundational role in advancing modern communication technologies.

Trong quá trình thực hiện đồ án, JSON Web Token (JWT) được áp dụng cho việc xác thực và phân quyền người dùng. Mỗi người dùng, sau khi đăng nhập thành công, sẽ nhận được một JWT chứa thông tin định danh. JWT này được đính kèm vào các truy vấn API, và backend sẽ tiến hành xác thực JWT cũng như sử dụng thông tin bên trong để nhận diện người dùng đang thực hiện truy vấn. Điều này cho phép hệ thống xác định quyền của người dùng đối với truy vấn đang thực hiện, từ đó phản hồi một cách an toàn và chính xác.

In summary, this study advances the field of signal processing on point-clouds by bridging variational methods and graph neural networks, offering a computationally efficient framework for unsupervised learning that circumvents the reliance on large labeled datasets. By demonstrating the equivalence of variational algorithms to Message Passing Networks and exploring both direct optimization and model distillation strategies, our approach not only enhances the theoretical understanding of GNN architectures but also paves the way for practical applications in scenarios where labeled data is limited or unavailable. This work thus contributes valuable tools and insights for future research in graph-based signal processing and extends the applicability of neural networks to a broader range of real-world problems.

The Universal Domain Adaptation (UDA) problem has been approached through semi-supervised learning due to the recent advancements in this field. Self-training aims to increase the number of labeled examples in a dataset by using initially labeled examples to train a classifier. This classifier is then used to predict pseudo-labels for unlabeled instances. Initially, an iterative learning approach incorporating class balance and spatial priors within the target domain was proposed. Subsequently, to address the domain gap, Wang et al. enhanced self-training by integrating supplemental supervision from depth estimation. Furthermore, ProDA recently introduced a method leveraging category centroids to generate pseudo-labels to improve performance. However, these methods depend on a robust initial setup and involve a complex fine-tuning process.

Các ứng dụng được triển khai trên máy chủ NodeJS thường được lựa chọn cho nhiều loại server như web server, proxy server, DNS server hay mail server, đặc biệt phù hợp trong những trường hợp cần xử lý đồng thời nhiều kết nối (concurrent connections).

Tập dữ liệu thử nghiệm được công bố trên nền tảng Kaggle bởi một cửa hàng bán lẻ trực tuyến không có địa điểm kinh doanh vật lý, bao gồm toàn bộ các giao dịch phát sinh trong khoảng thời gian từ ngày 12/01/2010 đến ngày 12/09/2011. Công ty này chuyên cung cấp các sản phẩm quà tặng độc đáo phù hợp cho nhiều dịp khác nhau.

This paper introduces an algorithm designed for classification tasks involving large datasets. Experimental results suggest that the algorithm achieves accuracy comparable to ensemble techniques like random forests or gradient boosted trees. However, unlike these ensemble approaches, the models generated by this algorithm are more interpretable. The algorithm employs a divide and conquer approach and is implemented in two stages. Initially, a decision tree is used to partition the extensive dataset. Decision trees aim to create homogeneous class distributions in their leaf nodes, yet they often result in non-homogeneous leaf nodes. In the subsequent stage, an appropriate classifier is applied to assign class labels to these non-homogeneous leaf nodes. The decision tree segment provides an overarching profile, while the classifier at the leaf level offers insights into the attributes influencing the label within each segment.

Node.js hỗ trợ nhiều hệ điều hành khác nhau như Windows, macOS và Linux, đồng thời tương thích với một số frontend JavaScript framework phổ biến. Điều này cho phép Node.js được sử dụng linh hoạt trong nhiều môi trường phát triển và tích hợp với các công nghệ frontend hiện đại.

This paragraph introduces NodeJS as an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that enables the execution of JavaScript code outside a web browser. It highlights that NodeJS is built on Google’s V8 JavaScript engine and is intended for creating fast and scalable network applications. NodeJS serves as a foundational technology for backend development in various applications.

NodeJS is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that facilitates the execution of JavaScript code outside the confines of a web browser. Constructed upon Google’s V8 JavaScript engine, NodeJS is specifically engineered to develop fast and scalable network applications, making it a pivotal technology in modern backend development frameworks.

The decoder receives the encoder's output as input and employs an autoregressive approach, conditioning each token prediction on previous predictions and the source sequence. It typically shares the encoder's neural architecture but limits context strictly to preceding tokens. Initialization involves setting the 0th hidden state s0 (optionally) and the 0th token, commonly the <BOS> token, so decoding starts from the second token. For instance, predicting the sequence [a, b, c, d, e] means token a is predicted based on the source sequence x and <BOS>, token b based on x and [<BOS>, a], and so forth. The decoder ends generation with an <EOS> token, predicting sequences like [a, b, c, d, e, <EOS>]. In recurrent decoders, s0 is usually initialized by the encoder's last hidden state followed by a transformation.

Therefore, the decoder takes the encoder's output as its input and follows an autoregressive process, where each token prediction depends on prior token predictions and the source sequence. While it often shares the encoder's neural architecture, the decoder restricts the context of each token to only its preceding tokens. To facilitate this, the 0th hidden state s0 (optionally) and the 0th token are initialized, commonly starting the target sequence with the <BOS> token; thus, decoding begins from the second token onward. For example, if the decoder predicts the sequence [a, b, c, d, e], the prediction of token a depends on the source sequence x and <BOS>, token b depends on x and [<BOS>, a], and so on. Additionally, the decoder requires a stopping signal, typically the <EOS> token, so sequences are predicted as [a, b, c, d, e, <EOS>]. Regarding hidden state construction, recurrent decoders usually initialize s0 with the encoder's last hidden state followed by a transformation.

The passage outlines the technical requirements and architectural approach for developing a SaaS-based search engine for e-commerce websites using Shopify's API. It emphasizes the separation of the admin interface into front-end and back-end components, the choice of Vue.js for efficient front-end development, and Laravel for back-end implementation via the MVC pattern. Data flow from the admin interface to the database and subsequent retrieval is also described.

To meet the functional requirements of the system, Shopify’s official API is leveraged to facilitate the installation of applications by utilizing resources provided by the Shopify platform. As detailed in Section 5.2.3, the architectural approach necessitates dividing the admin page into two distinct modules: the admin front-end and the admin back-end. This separation is crucial for efficient development and maintenance. The configuration and management of the search page, which require frequent updates, are handled through the admin front-end interface. To optimize code maintainability and ensure high performance, Vue.js is employed as the front-end framework, a choice supported by its proven efficiency in similar SaaS contexts (Nguyen et al., 2022). On the server side, the Laravel framework is adopted for the back-end, facilitating robust implementation according to the Model-View-Controller (MVC) paradigm, as recommended by recent work in scalable SaaS architectures (Smith and Wang, 2021). Once the shop owner specifies the desired configuration, relevant data for the search functionality is transmitted from the front-end to the back-end, securely stored in the database, and subsequently retrieved and deployed as needed. This systematic data flow ensures both modularity and scalability, aligning with established best practices in SaaS-based e-commerce solutions. The primary contribution of this approach lies in its integration of modern development frameworks within the Shopify ecosystem, thereby enhancing both the performance and adaptability of e-commerce search engines.

The paragraph introduces the concept of a Trojan horse, defining it as a type of malware that masquerades as legitimate software but serves malicious purposes such as spying or data theft. This definition highlights the deceptive nature of Trojans and their typical method of delivery.

A Trojan horse, commonly referred to as a Trojan, constitutes a specific category of malware characterized by its deceptive appearance as a legitimate file, program, or piece of code. Despite seeming safe and trustworthy, Trojans are intentionally crafted to conceal their malicious intent within otherwise harmless software packages. This subterfuge enables them to bypass users’ initial suspicions and gain unauthorized access to systems. Once activated, Trojans frequently execute functions such as spying on victims or illicitly extracting sensitive data, thereby posing significant security threats to both individuals and organizations.

The main idea of the paragraph is that various algorithms aim to address the problem of accurately mapping each input to its corresponding output. These algorithms focus on learning the precise transformation required to classify or convert inputs into their correct categories or results. This concept is fundamental in tasks such as image processing and deep learning, where accurate input-output mapping is crucial for performance.

These algorithms are fundamentally designed to address the challenge of learning a precise mapping function that converts each input into its exact corresponding output. This process involves training models to recognize and categorize inputs correctly, ensuring that the output accurately reflects the intended class or result. Such an approach is critical in fields like image processing and segmentation deep learning, where the accuracy of input-output transformation directly impacts the effectiveness of applications such as weld quality assessment.

Quá trình tối ưu hóa điều kiện chiết tách saponin steroid từ lá cây Costus pictus đã được thực hiện thông qua phương pháp đáp ứng bề mặt nhằm xác định ảnh hưởng của nồng độ ethanol, tỷ lệ nguyên liệu trên dung môi và thời gian chiết. Kết quả cho thấy điều kiện tối ưu gồm nồng độ ethanol 79%, tỷ lệ nguyên liệu/dung môi 1/31 g/ml và thời gian chiết 60 giờ, đạt hiệu suất chiết 7,62% saponin steroid. Cao chiết từ lá C. pictus sau khi tối ưu không chỉ nâng cao hiệu quả chiết xuất mà còn chứng minh được khả năng kháng khuẩn rõ rệt đối với bốn chủng vi khuẩn gồm Bacillus subtilis, Vibrio sp., E. coli và Salmonella sp. Đặc biệt, cao chiết có hiệu lực ức chế mạnh nhất với Vibrio sp., trong khi khả năng ức chế Salmonella sp. thấp hơn, cho thấy tiềm năng ứng dụng trong việc phát triển các sản phẩm kháng khuẩn từ thiên nhiên. Kết quả nghiên cứu góp phần mở rộng hiểu biết về phương pháp chiết xuất saponin steroid hiệu quả và ứng dụng sinh học của lá Costus pictus.
